pageContext.claim: “Democrats are now the party of high taxes, high crime, open borders, late-term abortion, socialism, and blatant corruption. The Republican Party is the party of the American Worker, the American Family, and the American Dream!”
pageContext.analysis: The fact that Democrats oppose some of Trump's policies or espouse liberal priorities does not mean they support the destruction of the country, want a coup or that their ideas would ruin society.
